effect.sword_shield: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.legends_arceus: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.

short_effect.sword_shield: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user launches countless stones at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.
